channel.title: Adding drops
channel.description:
I have a question about NPCDROP.cfg I edit it so that I have a guard(9) that drops 1k coins (995) I save the cfg, compile, run, but when I kill guards, i get nothing.
Heres my first two lines :
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 9 1 995 1000
whats wrong with this? No monsters drop anything, even with there being a line of code for almost every monster! Whats wrong? Is it my code? Plz tell me if I am supposed to edit something else too, or if this is wrong. I also am wonder what the drop type thing means.

item.title: Adding drops
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Nope. Nothing like that there. It has this:

public static int abyssaldemon[] = {4151,526,526,526,526,526,526,526};

public static int randomabyssaldemon()

and a lot like it. But no guard one. How does it know that thats a demon with no NPCID in it?

Read full topic

item.title: Adding drops
item.dc:creator: @Zz_M4TT_zZ Zz M4TT zZ
item.description:
@Zz_M4TT_zZ wrote:

Don’t look in that. Look in Item2.java and search Randomgaurd and there should be a list of drops. then add the 1k coins compile, run your done.
it should look like this public static int gaurd[] = { 379, 379, 379, 379, 379, 444, 444, 444, 444, 444, 561, 561, 561, 561, 561, 379, 379, 379, 379, 379, 444, 444, 444, 444, 444, 561, 561, 561, 561, 561, 746};

Read full topic

I have a question about NPCDROP.cfg I edit it so that I have a guard(9) that drops 1k coins (995) I save the cfg, compile, run, but when I kill guards, i get nothing.
